description: Primula is a mysterious "being" from the Demon World who appeared in episode 2 looking for Rin in Shuffle! and eventually moves in with him and Kaede Fuyou. She grows a strong attachement to Rin and also Kaede . She was particularly close to Nerine for other reasons. Primula rarely smiled at all. In her hands she held a cat doll which she is seen playing with from time to time.
name: Primula
